articles.title: 3one4 Capital raises $200 Mn for its fourth early-stage fund - Entrackr
articles.description: Early-stage VC firm 3one4 Capital, an investor in startups like Licious, Loantap, Koo, Darwinbox and Open, has closed its fourth fund.
